text: Elvis Plori (born 5 August 1978 in Shkodër) is an Albanian football coach and former player, who is the current manager of Besëlidhja Lezhë in the Albanian First Division.Plori, trajneri i ri i BurrelitElvis Plori drejte KF Terbuni si trajner ==Managerial career== He was appointed coach of Burreli in January 2012Elvis Plori, drejt emërimit si trajner i Burrelit - Panorama and reappointed later again in 2012Plori në delir: Ky është Burreli im - Panorama and of Tërbuni Pukë in 2014-15.Elvis Plori: Tërbuni, gati për kampionatin - Panorama Plori was named manager of Besëlidhja in June 2017Ndryshime në stolin e Besëlidhjes, Elvis Plori drejt marrjes së drejtimit - Panorama and took charge of Kastrioti in June 2018.Plori: E kisha peng rikthimin te Kastrioti, ja plani i merkatos - Panorama He left Burreli for a fourth time in summer 2019 for another spell at Besëlidhja.I del emri në Lezhë, Plori: Jam gati për bisedime - Panorama ==References== ==External links== * Profile - FSHF Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Shkodër Category:Association football midfielders Category:Albanian footballers Category:KF Laçi players Category:KF Vllaznia Shkodër players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Albanian football managers Category:KF Vllaznia Shkodër managers Category:KS Burreli managers Category:KF Tërbuni Pukë managers Category:KS Kastrioti managers Category:Besëlidhja Lezhë managers Category:Albanian Superliga managers
title: Elvis Plori
